title: srI raama raguraama
sahitya:
shrI rAma raghurAma shrngAra rAmayani cintinca rAdE O manasA

caraNam 1

 taluku cekkula muddu beTTu kausalya munu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya (kausalya muu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya)
   
caraNam 2

 dasharathuDu shrI rAma rArA ani biluva munu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya (dasharathuDu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya)
   
caraNam 3

 tanavAra paricaya sEya saumitri munu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya (saumitri tapamEmi jEsenO teliya)
   
caraNam 4

 tanavaNTa jana jUci upponga kaushikuDu munu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya (kaushikuDu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya)
   
caraNam 5

 tApambanagi rUpavati uaTakahalya tapamEmi jEsenO teliya (ahalya tapamEmi jEsenO teliya)
   
caraNam 6

 dharmAtmu caraNambu sOka shivu cApambu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya ( shiva tapamEmi jEsenO teliya)
   
caraNam 7

 tana tanaya nosagi kanulAra gana janakuDu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya (A janakuDu tapamEmi jEsenO teliya)
   
caraNam 8

 daharambu karaga karamunu baTTa jAnaki tapamEmi jEsenO teliya (A jAnaki tapamEmi jEsenO teliya)
   
caraNam 9

 tyAgarAjApta ani pogaDa nArada mauni tapamEmi jEsenO teliya (A mauni tapamEmi jEsenO teliya)
